MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CH8 postcode area of Holywell affecting properties in Williams Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:01AM. Our engineers are on site to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.03AM  on 17th October 2020.
